name: Cannerian Tale
description:
Cute and lovely Canned Boys
will melt your heart!

Become the chosen guardian
and adopt these adorable Canned Boys!
Heart Sniper !!!!!
Heart Pounder !!!!!

Unlock hidden stories as you adopt.
Emotional Captivation !!!!

Don't forget their special illustrations.
Collector Worthy !!!!!

Cheery journals of Canned Boys on an adventure.
Jolly Fun !!!!

Your town will grow as you collect these boys.
Desire to Decorate !!!!

Here comes the adorable boys
who will snipe your heart!

Wanna go open these Canned Boys?
